content.body: I’m looking at https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/38254/files and wondering why MDN might have ever had `NodeFilter.SHOW_ATTRIBUTE` and `NodeFilter.SHOW_CDATA_SECTION` flagged as deprecated to begin with
